title: Orbital Temple-ah thilpek pe rawh
heading: I Thilpek chu Tihfel rawh
chooseHow: Tax-deductible donation i tihfel duh dan tur thlang rawh:

option1.heading: Thil tih theih 1: Tunah hian Online-a thilpek pe rawh
option1.description: Kan fiscal sponsor him tak, The Field kaltlangin credit card, debit card, emaw online-a pawisa pek dan dang hmangin i thilpek chu tifel nghal rawh. Instant tax receipt i dawng ang.
option1.button: The Field kaltlangin thilpek pe rawh →

option2.heading: Thil tih theih 2: The Roy Foundation-ah Bank Deposit
option2.description: Kan strategic partner leh fiscal sponsor The Roy Foundation -ah direct bank deposit emaw wire transfer emaw siam rawh. He option hi donation lian zawk emaw international transfer emaw atan a tha hle.
option2.instructions: Reference field-ah " Orbital Temple - {donationType} " tih kha ziak la. I transfer i tih zawh hnuah sathi.roy@orbitaltemple.art ah i transfer details nen email la, i tax receipt i dawng ang.

taxInfo.heading: Tax-Deductible Thilpek pek
taxInfo.description: Orbital Temple hi fiscally sponsored project a ni a, The Field (Performance Zone Inc.) , 501(c)(3) hmanga hlawkna nei lo pawl a ni. US contribution zawng zawng hi danin a phal chinah chhiah lak theih a ni.
taxInfo.questions: Zawhna i nei em? gabriela.veiga@orbitaltemple.art ah min rawn biak theih reng e
